about_the_game:
About This Game

Step into the untamed wilderness of WildLands, a multiplayer survival battle royale where you must gather resources, craft tools, and build your stronghold to endure the elements—and the competition. In this stylized 3D world, every decision you make can mean the difference between life and death. Will you cooperate with others or stand alone as the ultimate survivor?

Key Features

🌲 Immersive Survival Gameplay

  • Gather essential resources like wood, stone, and food to survive in a hostile environment.

  • Craft tools, weapons, and shelter to protect yourself from enemies and the elements.

  • Manage hunger, health, and temperature as you adapt to the ever-changing world.

⚔️ Thrilling Multiplayer Experience

  • Join real-time multiplayer matches with players around the world.

  • Team up to share resources—or fight for dominance in intense PvP combat.

  • Use an emoji-based communication system, breaking language barriers for seamless interaction.

🌌 Dynamic World

  • Explore a vibrant wilderness with forests, water sources, and wildlife.

  • Face the challenge of a day-night cycle, with threats increasing after dark.

  • Encounter animals that may become your foes or allies in your journey.

🎨 NFT-Based Customization (WEB-3 Ready)

  • Personalize your character, tools, and shelter with unique NFT-based designs.

  • Show off your creativity while maintaining fair, balanced gameplay—customizations are purely cosmetic!

🎮 Accessible and Intuitive

  • Enjoy a minimalistic and fluid user interface optimized for keyboard, controller, or mouse play.

  • Easy matchmaking with room codes or automatic pairing for quick sessions.

Why Play WildLands?

Whether you’re a lone wolf or a team player, WildLands offers a dynamic survival experience where every match is a fresh adventure. With its unique blend of crafting, building, and combat, this game challenges you to thrive in a harsh world while standing out with personalized characters and tools.

Ready to take on the wild? Wishlist now and prepare for the Alpha release!

Step into the untamed wilderness of WildLands, a multiplayer survival battle royale where you must gather resources, craft tools, and build your stronghold to endure the elements—and the competition. In this stylized 3D world, every decision you make can mean the difference between life and death. Will you cooperate with others or stand alone as the ultimate survivor?

🌲 Immersive Survival Gameplay

  • Craft tools, weapons, and shelter to protect yourself from enemies and the elements.

  • Manage hunger, health, and temperature as you adapt to the ever-changing world.

⚔️ Thrilling Multiplayer Experience

  • Join real-time multiplayer matches with players around the world.

  • Use an emoji-based communication system, breaking language barriers for seamless interaction.

  • Face the challenge of a day-night cycle, with threats increasing after dark.

🎮 Accessible and Intuitive

  • Easy matchmaking with room codes or automatic pairing for quick sessions.

Why Play WildLands?

Whether you’re a lone wolf or a team player, WildLands offers a dynamic survival experience where every match is a fresh adventure. With its unique blend of crafting, building, and combat, this game challenges you to thrive in a harsh world while standing out with personalized characters and tools.

Ready to take on the wild? Wishlist now and prepare for the Alpha release!
name: Wild Lands

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 4GB / AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: WildLands is a multiplayer survival battle royale where you gather, craft, build, and fight to survive a vibrant, dangerous world. Customize characters with NFTs, adapt to a day-night cycle, and face off against players or team up to thrive. Do you have what it takes to conquer the wild?
